casebody.data:
Anthony Payne SILER
v.
Ripley RAND, Resident Superior Court Judge. No. 396P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 5, 2005. Anthony Payne Siler, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 27th day of July 2005 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Chatham County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 5th day of August 2005."
